rows.label: qst701103_msg0001
rows.name:
Young lady, I am interested in
what you will accomplish and what
you will create in the future.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0002
rows.name:
My apprentice should still be in the residential
area. If you would be willing to help with the
shipbuilding, I would like you to visit him.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0003
rows.name:
But do not forget: for what
purpose, whom you help, and
where you yourself are headed.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0101
rows.name:
Fufufu, so you have returned. Wotta has
always been like that. Allow me to tell
you about the necessary glass and wood.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0102
rows.name:
For the wood, durability is essential.
Muscle Branches from Gula would be good.
For now, that will be ten pieces.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0103
rows.name:
Next, the glass plate. Ordinary glass
lacks strength. In other words, what
we need is reinforced glass...

rows.label: qst701103_msg0104
rows.name:
As you'd expect, you can't just find
this lying around. It would be best
to ask a specialist for cooperation.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0105
rows.name:
Finally, as for the helmsman,
I have someone in mind. A
woman in Gula named Maquia.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0106
rows.name:
If you mention my name,
she will listen to you.
May I ask you to do this?

rows.label: qst701103_msg0201
rows.name:
Wotta is a restless fellow, but on the
other hand, it means he has the passion
and will to achieve his goals.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0202
rows.name:
No matter how many detours he takes, he
always returns to his starting point.
This is not something everyone can do.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0203
rows.name:
...In short, he's a promising fellow. I
believe he will one day do a great work
that will be of service to you all.

rows.label: qst701103_msg0204
rows.name:
He is an unworthy apprentice,
but please watch over him with
a long-term perspective.
